Author: James clear
Remarks:
Helped me to be productive.
How to raise and adult,Julie Lythcott-Haims,Talks about helicopter parenting.Book is repeating concepts over and over again.primary target of the book is upper middle class urban community.so some concepts are not our problem at all. But still worth reading."

Author: Michale Collins
Remarks: Mystery thriller novel from 60s. Enjoyed it.

Author: Austin kleone
Remarks: Small book about creativity.Copy from others and present in your own way.Nothing is original.
